content: Ha ha.. Very nice.. I kinda go through a similar dilemma of picking a right notebook when I have plenty. Or even be a lil scared of spoiling it with any useless rumbles. Now I kinda relate to it n find it funny. :D maybe that’s the purpose of having a notebook in the first place. And also not restricting to one book is in itself so liberating which eventually might instigate me to just start emoting on any God damn paper right away!
